channel.title: Need help on picking a base
channel.description:
ok so I've been looking around and all i see is pi server's witch I've been told are crap so i was wondering what base to use to start my server 317 server.
thanks in advance. ;)

item.title: Need help on picking a base
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Darthax, post:6, topic:390652”]Awesome thanks guys. now i gotta go find one that isnt crammed full off crap lol[/quote]use the recent one ins erver downloads “mustangescape3” not a lot has been added so will be good practice.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help on picking a base
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I agree with Jc, use a pi base. Work your way up. After you learn enough from that you can go to hyperion.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on picking a base

item.title: Need help on picking a base
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Use Project Insanity or Delta. People are telling you it sucks just because others are saying it too. You’ll never have any success with Hyperion at this point.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on picking a base

item.dc:creator: @Darthax Darthax
item.description:
@Darthax wrote:

[quote=“Nasz, post:2, topic:390652”]I’ve heard Hyperion is stable, but I know nothing on 317’s, just trying too point you in a direction for now ;/.[/quote] yea but i can’t seem to find any atm but i have only just started looking thanks

Read full topic
